SEARCH
Module CODEX
Package CODEX.org.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
CODEX.org.model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a board for a player. This is a space where the player can place his cards during the game. It has dynamic dimensions, depending on how many players there are in a game.
See Also:

    • Board

      public Board(Player player)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      player - board's owner

  • Method Details

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard(int nPlayers)
      This method creates and initialises the table of the specific Player, after the number of players is set
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - is the number of players that are playing the Game

    • placeBaseCard

      public void placeBaseCard(PlayableCard baseCard)
      This method places the first card for a player in the middle of the table (boardDimension/2) and adds related resources
      Parameters:
      baseCard - is the base card the Player has placed

    • placeCard

      public boolean placeCard(PlayableCard card, Coordinates position)
      Places a card in the table and updates playable/unplayable positions
      Parameters:
      card - is the card (gold/resource) the Player wants to play
      position - is the place where the Player wants to play the card
      Returns:
      true if the card can be placed, false if the card can't be placed in that position

    • cardPoints

      public int cardPoints(PlayableCard card, int coveredAngles)
      When passed a resourceCard, the method gives the points scored by that specific card When passed a goldCard, the method checks the "scoring condition" (angles coverage/number of objects)
      Parameters:
      card - is the card the Player has just placed
      coveredAngles - is the number of angles covered by the PlayableCard just placed
      Returns:
      points are the points actually scored thanks to card

    • enoughResources

      public boolean enoughResources(PlayableCard card)
      This method checks if the Player has enough resources to place the card
      Parameters:
      card - is the card the Player has just placed
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates if the Player has enough resources to play the specific card

    • updateUnplayablePositions

      public void updateUnplayablePositions(PlayableCard card)
      Adding all the positions where the angle is ABSENT (players can't use that angle)
      Parameters:
      card - is the card for which we are updating the unplayable positions

    • updatePlayablePositions

      public void updatePlayablePositions(PlayableCard card)
      Adding all the positions where the player can place a card in the future
      Parameters:
      card - is the card for which we are updating the playable positions

    • getPlayablePositions

      public Set<Coordinates> getPlayablePositions()
      Getter method
      Returns:
      a Set containing the positions where it's possible to play a card

    • getUnPlayablePositions

      public Set<Coordinates> getUnPlayablePositions()
      Getter method
      Returns:
      a Set containing the positions where it's impossible to play a card

    • getBoardDimensions

      public int getBoardDimensions()
      Getter method
      Returns:
      the board dimension (calculated by the number of players)

      public Map<Coordinates,AngleType> getPlayedCards()
      Getter method
